sentences.english: Critics argue this stunt is hostile to the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 批語家指出這樣的驚人表演是對天主教堂的不敬重。

sentences.english: Most of the voters are lining up to support him in the election campaign.
sentences.chinese: 有幾年，聯合會對勞聯表示敬重，以支持勞工運動。

sentences.english: The adorable thing is that great deal of designers are opting for counterfeit fur .
sentences.chinese: 值得敬重的是許多的設計師都選擇用假的皮草。

sentences.english: People really love and venerate the Americans.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏的人真的是喜歡並敬重美國人。

sentences.english: Learn at school in the crowd JiangYongQuan mixed gaze, his eyes full of respect.
sentences.chinese: 娟子攙雜在人羣中凝視姜永泉，目光中充溢敬重。

sentences.english: The"irony and esteem"presented two sides of researching the art of Anselm Kiefer .
sentences.chinese: 正是“反諷與敬重”呈現了基弗藝術研究的雙重意義。

sentences.english: They heard it all, and did but reverence him the more.
sentences.chinese: 他們全都聽進了耳朵，但他們都對他益發敬重。

sentences.english: Blessed to open the last dispensation, Kings shall extol him, and nations revere.
sentences.chinese: 衆神祝福最後福音期開啓，萬王稱頌全民內心敬重。

sentences.english: She respects Mr. Bascomb and doesn't mind taking orders from him.
sentences.chinese: 她敬重巴斯康卜先生，也不介意聽從他的命令。

sentences.english: And I will conclude I must think very highly of you.
sentences.chinese: 我就會得出結論，我一定很敬重你。

sentences.english: All the ones I just named, but I have special admiration and respect for Bj0rk.
sentences.chinese: 所有的我都想說，但我最敬重仰慕的就是比約克了。

sentences.english: Thus he spoke, and the other Greeks revered the priest and assented .
sentences.chinese: 他這樣說了之後，其他的希臘人都敬重祭司便同意了。

sentences.english: Zhou Gucheng is a respectable educationist.
sentences.chinese: 周谷城是受人敬重的教育家。

sentences.english: Things that make us smile, laugh and feel good are just awesome.
sentences.chinese: 所有讓我們笑逐顏開，感覺不錯的事都值得敬重。

sentences.english: I cherish and respect every living day.
sentences.chinese: 我珍惜並敬重生命中的每一天。

definition: to admire/to revere/to look up to
to admire/to look up to/to respect sb greatly
